bilingual.source: Greta soon became the voice of a movement.
bilingual.target: 格里塔很快成为了一场运动的代言人。

bilingual.source: The movement of the waves was mesmerizing.

bilingual.target: 朋克运动始于20世纪70年代。

bilingual.source: The movement of the car was smooth and swift.
bilingual.target: 汽车的运动平稳而迅速。
动眼神经控制眼睛的运动。

bilingual.source: A mass movement can change social structures.
bilingual.target: 群众运动可以改变社会结构。

bilingual.source: The movement rises in the early 20th century.
bilingual.target: 这场运动发源于20世纪初。

bilingual.source: The deltoid is crucial for shoulder movement.
bilingual.target: 三角肌对肩部运动至关重要。

bilingual.source: Some whites supported the civil rights movement.
bilingual.target: 一些白种人支持民权运动。

list.abstract: 《movement》是一首由LCD Soundsystem演唱的歌曲，所属专辑为《The Long Goodbye: Live at Madison Square Garden》。
movement，英语单词，名词，意为“运动；活动；运转；乐章”。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm hoping to extract an algorithm to define their movement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望能创造一条能够描述他们运动的运算法则。

yingyinNormal.en: We code the data into the movement of the second hand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以把数据转化成秒针的运动。

yingyinNormal.en: No, what if it was a precursor movement along the leading edge of the plate boundary fault from Los Angeles all the way up to San Francisco?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，如果这是板块运动的开始，而板块的边界从洛杉矶一直延续到旧金山。

yingyinNormal.en: With pressure from the growing environmental movement, president Richard Nixon signed the clean air act of 1970 into law.
yingyinNormal.zh: 随着环境保护运动的展开，迫于压力，理查得·尼克松总统在1970年签署了《清洁空气法案》。

yingyinNormal.en: Forced into it by a society no longer willing to support them. That may soon be changing, due to a growing movement to bring the Supers back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 社会不再支持他们他们被迫转入地下。这一切也许即将改变一项不断壮大的运动将让超人重回公众视野。

yingyinNormal.en: And with movement interesting things begin to happen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以行动后就会发生有趣的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh yeah, Dana Keystone. She was in my Movement class.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道，黛娜基史东，我们一起修动作课。

yingyinNormal.en: My mother calls me at work to see if I had a healthy bowel movement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我妈妈会在上班时打给我问我排便是否正常.

yingyinNormal.en: What's a Movement class? It's Chandler's way of pretending he didn't take mime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么是动作课？钱德在假装他没修过哑剧。

yingyinNormal.en: You're eating a zarg-nut. But my movement was so slow that it's imperceptible. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在吃花生糖呢。但是我的动作如此缓慢令人难以察觉。不是。

yingyinNormal.en: Peach, any movement? He's had four cups of coffee. It's gotta be soon. Keep on him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 桃桃，有什么情况？他已经喝了至少四杯咖啡了，我看快了。继续监视住他。

yingyinNormal.en: We went to Beijing to find out how they cope with the biggest movement of people on Earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们来到北京，去探究他们如何应对这场地球上最大的人员转移。

yingyinNormal.en: Unacceptable. The delay would result in tomorrow morning's bowel movement occurring at work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不予通过，吃饭太晚会造成明天早晨的大肠蠕动出现在工作时间。

yingyinNormal.en: Every movement I made was entirely random, every new personality just on the roll of a dice!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的每一步都是完全随机的，每个新身份都全凭掷骰子决定！

yingyinNormal.en: He threw everything into physio the first year, and all he got from it was slight movement in his thumb and finger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一年他非常努力做物理治疗，结果只能稍微动一动大拇指和食指。

yingyinNormal.en: Today we're gonna be working on managing our anger through movement. The first pose is the dancer pose. Great form, Terence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天我们一起学习一个方法来管理我们的愤怒，用肢体活动，第一个动作，叫做舞者式，做得很好，大红。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't stop our movement down this river, and we can't avoid the encounters. We can only approach them in the best possible way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们身在时间之河上停不下来，也无法避免问题。我们只能选择最好的处理办法。

yingyinNormal.en: But all my efforts our dinner schedule, my pajama rotation, my bowel movement spreadsheet it's clear now, I've been wasting my time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而我所有的努力，我的晚餐安排，我的睡衣轮换制，我的排便情况试算表，现在我算明白了，我一直在浪费时间。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Yeah, but the earthquake that they felt was from movement along the fault line in the central valley. Their end of the fault line has not moved yet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，不过他们感受到的地震来自中央谷断层线的活动。而尾部的断层线还没有开始移动。

yingyinNormal.en: The most revered of the mythical animals, its movement in the performance must demonstrate its power and dignity, and the longer it is, the more luck it will bring the community.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它是最神秘和令人敬畏的动物，表演中的每个动作都是在彰显自己的权力和尊严，舞龙越长，越是能给社区带来好运。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 动；移动；变动；团体；乐章；机械装置；可动装置；运动；活动；动向
adj. 行进的；活动的；动人的；感人的

word_family.mean: v. 动；移动；改变位置；改变状态；进展；发展；在…中进行社交活动；动议；提议；使（肠）排空

sense_info_list.en: a group of people with a particular set of aims

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>movement</highlight>, driven by powerful and diverse motivations, built a nation out of a wilderness and, shaped the character and destiny of an uncharted continent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这场运动，在强大而多样的动机的驱使下，在一片荒野上建立了一个国家，塑造了一个未知大陆的性格和命运。

sense_info_list.en: an occasion when something develops, changes, or happens in a particular way or direction

examination_example.sentence: Why has the <highlight>movement</highlight> to a cashless society been so slow in coming?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么向无现金社会的转变如此缓慢?

sense_info_list.en: any of the main parts that a long piece of music is divided into

examination_example.sentence: It is not by chance that the Funeral March is not the last <highlight>movement</highlight> of the Eroica Symphony, but the second.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 葬礼进行曲不是英雄交响曲的最后一个乐章而是第二个乐章，这绝非偶然。

sense_info_list.en: what someone is doing during a particular period

word_usage.usage:
复数movements可以表示“举止，态度，姿势”，如：
Her movements were very elegant. 
她的举止很高雅。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“运动、动作、调动”，常指具体的运动。
指“与静相对应的动”，是抽象概念，多用于科技语。
侧重有组织的运动，尤其政治或商业上的活动和竞选活动。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 运动; 移动; 运输

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people working together to advance their shared political, social, or artistic ideas

examination_example.sentence: The low-carbohydrate food <highlight>movement</highlight> gave birth to such diets as the Atkins, Paleo and Keto.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 低碳水化合物食品运动催生了诸如阿特金斯(Atkins)，克洛(Paleo)和基多(Keto)等饮食法。

sense_info_list.en: an act of changing location or position
sense_info_list.zh: 运动; 移动; 运输

examination_example.sentence: An upward <highlight>movement</highlight> of nutrient-rich sea supports a huge abundance of marine life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个上涨的，营养丰富的海洋，它养育着大量的海洋生物。

sense_info_list.en: a change or development of ideas, behavior, or progress

examination_example.sentence: The study by Greenpeace analyzed the <highlight>movements</highlight> of krill fishing vessels in the region.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 绿色和平组织 (Greenpeace) 研究分析了该地区的磷虾渔船的动向。

sense_info_list.en: one's activities over a period of time, especially as watched by someone else

examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今创客运动在美国各地的社区和一些学校蓬勃发展也就不足为奇了。

examination_example.sentence: The Maker <highlight>Movement</highlight> is rediscovering learning by doing, which is Dewey's phrase from 100 years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 创客运动正重新认识到“做中学”价值，这一说法是100年前由 Dewey 提出的。

examination_example.sentence: The food-as-medicine <highlight>movement</highlight> has been around for decades, but it's making progress as physicians and medical institutions make food a formal part of treatment, rather than relying solely on medications (药物) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以食物作为药物的运动已经存在了几十年，但它正在取得进展，因为医生和医疗机构使食物成为治疗的正式部分，而不是仅仅依靠药物。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an act of changing location or position
sense_info_list.zh: 运动; 移动; 运输

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>movement</highlight> of the ball causes a phoenix to move and make a sound.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 球的运动导致凤凰移动并发出声音。

examination_example.sentence: Fan changed the strength and <highlight>movement</highlight> of his hands as he roasted leaves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 樊在烤树叶时改变了手的力度和动作。

examination_example.sentence: Any sound or <highlight>movement</highlight> makes the water vibrate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何声音或运动都会使水产生振动。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people working together to advance their shared political, social, or artistic ideas

examination_example.sentence: A Swedish man called Erik started the <highlight>movement</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个叫埃里克的瑞典人开始了这项运动。
